titleStmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 176: Prayer book, morning Psalms

publicationStmt.publisher: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

notesStmt.note: Text breaks denoted by an encircled punctus; Fol. contains a fragment of the common morning service, includes the assembled Psalm excerpts יהי כבוד and Psalms CXLV (the fragment ends at verse 13). A text break is signified not at the beginning of אשרי but before the last verse of יהי כבוד; Contains readings that vary from biblical orthography, probably vulgar phonetic, or errant.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 1; lines: 11; ruling method: left rule occasionally justified by cramping exceeding word between lines.

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).
